hooks.prompt: If you just modified a Dart file in lib/ or test/ directory (lib/**/*.dart or test/**/*.dart), run 'flutter analyze' to check for errors. If errors exist, fix them immediately (maximum 3 retry attempts). All errors and warnings must be addressed before proceeding, unless the user has configured specific ignore rules in .claude/flutter-ddd-builder.local.md. After 3 failed attempts, report the issue to the user.
